title: Programming Practical Skills Enhancement: Creative Thinking Development in Mathematics and Engineering Based on the Alan Hopper Model

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Creatively solve math/engineering problems by applying the five stages of Allen Hopper’s model (problem definition → idea generation → solution development → implementation → evaluation)
Collaborate with team members during PBL (Project-Based Learning) activities to derive three or more alternative approaches and select the optimal solution
Evaluate project deliverables by applying two or more creative thinking techniques (lateral thinking, divergent thinking)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
